SKT_FIRST.name: Just the Two of Us
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Shocked</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、対象に<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>感電</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> 확률로 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>감전</color>을 부여합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>的几率对目标造成<color=#28d9ed>触电</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。

SKT_SECOND.name: The Apple of Your Eye
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Stunned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. The damage increases if the target has been inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Shocked</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、対象に<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>スタン</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。対象が<color=#28d9ed>感電</color>状態の場合、ダメージがUPする。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 대상을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed> 스턴</color> 상태로 만듭니다. 대상이 <color=#28d9ed>감전</color> 상태라면 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>的几率使目标陷入<color=#28d9ed>晕眩</color>状态,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。当目标处于<color=#28d9ed>触电</color>状态时,伤害提升。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Out of My Way
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy.\nDecreases the target's <color=#28d9ed>Action Gauge</color> by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>, and has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to increase the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Effectiveness</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。\n対象の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>-30%</color>減少させ、<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>の確率で自分の<color=#28d9ed>効果命中</color>が<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPする。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다.\n대상의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>-30%</color> 감소시키고, <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> 확률로 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>효과 적중</color>이 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人。\n使目标的<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>减少<color=#28d9ed>-30%</color>,并有<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>的概率使自身的<color=#28d9ed>效果命中</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

3_jp: 効果命中発動確率増加+20%
3_zh: 效果命中发动概率提升+20%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Shocked</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Shocked</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、対象に<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>感電</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、対象の敵に<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>感電</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>감전</color>을 부여합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 적 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>감전</color>을 부여합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携技能自由顺序效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>的几率对目标造成<color=#28d9ed>触电</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color> 。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>的几率对敌人目标造成<color=#28d9ed>触电</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
